name: Quake Slider
description:
This game has been developed for the Löve Jam 2022 under the theme 'Earthquake'.

Your goal is to get out of the building. You must run and jump quickly to reach the red shelters and hide underneath before an earthquake begins.

Move:

  • XBox Controller: Left stick or DPad
  • Keyboard: Q & D (AZERTY)/ A & D (QWERTY)

Jump:

  • XBox Controller : A
  • Keyboard: Space bar

Slide (while running):

  • XBox Controller: X
  • Keyboard: S

Menu Navigation:

  • XBox Controller: DPad & A
  • Mouse & left-click

Pause the game:

  • XBox Controller: Start
  • Keyboard: Escape

Programming, music & sfx: Yoann Claude

Graphics, game design & level design: Antoine Heil
